author: SegmentLinking
body:
#### PR description:

This PR replaces the pT3 R-Phi chi-squared cut with a cut on the pT3 DNN for a reduced fake rate, improved efficiency (especially at low-pT), and fewer unmatched pLS's (pLS->pT3 conversion). 

**Some minor changes:** 

- I now define two sets of working points in the `Common.h` file, one used during pT3 track building and a second set used during pT5 building. I apply a tighter cut outside the barrel (95% vs 84%) to control the fake rate for pT3s. To select which set of cuts to use, I define two structs with member functions that allow me to toggle between the pT3 and pT5 cut values with a compile-time flag.
- The module type of the last "anchor" hit of the T3 is now added as an input feature to the DNN to improve the fake rate in an eta region outside the barrel where the DNN struggled.
- (For the standalone code) I merged the pT3 and pT3DNN flags used to save variables to the output ntuple to simplify what flags needed to be turned on when generating the training data for the pT3 DNN.

More info: [Replace_pT3_R-Phi_with_DNN.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/22909998/Replace_pT3_R-Phi_with_DNN.pdf)

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and runs on CPU and GPU with expected performance improvements.

c.c. @slava77
title: Line Segment Tracking (LST): Replace pT3 Rphi Chi-Squared Cut with DNN
